sense.def:
To conduct an activity or task
pomeni organizirati in izpeljati neko dejavnost ali nalogo.

seg.quote: We have been conducting a survey of the region.
Secrets are essential to the conduct of a war.
He instructed them in how to conduct themselves inside the mosque.
The minister had several good reasons for his conduct.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
conducts an orchestra or choir
, stoji pred orkestrom ali zborom in vodi njegov nastop.

seg.quote: I remember when I first conducted in London.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
conducts heat or electricity
, omogoči, da gresta skozenj vročina ali elektrika.
